name: Rust Guitar Song file
summary: A GUIT file contains a song created by Rust Guitar Tool, an acoustic guitar program. It contains the notes that make up a song along with the total number of notes in the song. GUIT files do not store actual audio, only notes that are played in Rust Guitar Tool.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: GUIT file open in Rust Guitar Tool
images.alt: GUIT file open in Rust Guitar Tool
